Silence::

She stayed still, perched on her tree limb, watching.  She felt her
inside fuel compartment give that shake that it was empty.  She turned
her owl head to see more of the ground under her.  She caught the
small movements of a mouse.  With no sound, she swooped down and
grasped the helpless creature in her sharp talons and retreated to her
previous perch.  She ate the mouse and felt satisfied.  She then
returned to her vigil on the pod. Hoping soon a bot would show over
the horizen. She only hoped it would be a maximal.
